item.title: Calling a Meeting
item.description: Callling a Meeting (召集开会) # Email Example # Subject: Meeting Next Friday Hi Everyone: We will be having a meeting next Friday from 2:00pm - 3:00pm in Room 3. All supervisors are expected to attend. The purpose of the meeting is to discuss the upcoming tourist season. As you probably have heard, this could be our busiest season to date. There are already 20 bus tours booked from China, and 15 walking tours booked from North America.
